name: Basic English
short_description:
The goal of the project is to create image, sound, document files based on the 850 word list created by Charles Kay Ogden.

1. Develop Bilingual MP3 audio files for  Basic English 850 word count.

2. Publish PDF books on Basic English

License :

All Document, Image, Sound files produced by the project are under CC BY-NC-SA 3.0 License.

http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/us/

Reference :

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Basic_English

http://simple.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Basic_English_ordered_wordlist

http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/us/
